thread.title: Showboating golf fan fakes-out two security guards and takes off running | For The Win
thread.title_full: Showboating golf fan fakes-out two security guards and takes off running | For The Win

author: Luke Kerr-Dineen
title: Showboating golf fan fakes-out two security guards and takes off running | For The Win
text:
Showboating golf fan fakes-out two security guards and takes off running Showboating golf fan fakes-out two security guards and takes off running By Luke Kerr-Dineen January 29, 2017 10:29 am Follow @LukeKerrDineen 697 shares Follow @LukeKerrDineen 
Streakers are generally pretty annoying, but it’s hard not to have begrudging respect for one like this, who appeared at the Farmers Insurance Open on Saturday. He taunts one of the security guards, jumps in the water, gets out, acts like he’s done, then takes off running again. By far the greatest thing I saw yesterday. pic.twitter.com/WXDjRs9ZN1 
— Harold Varner III (@HV3_Golf) January 28, 2017 More Golf!
